DOC.brief_summary: In proposal , investigator develop culturally-tailored , 8-week clinic-based weight loss program reduce obesity among postpartum African American ( AA ) adult woman integrate postpartum care model within clinical setting .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing Obesity Underserved Postpartum African American Women
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator proposal adapt The Diabetes Prevention Program ( DPP ) 16 session core curriculum 8 session model addition use cultural tailor technique DPP address need AA population several way : 1 ) The reference material lesson handout include information type food cook method use AA culture ( see Other Study Documents ) ; 2 ) Topics select group class appropriate participant Hip Hop Salsa dance physical activity . Participants randomize early postpartum period either usual care intervention . Usual care participant offer weight management standard care one visit dietitian Nutrition Weight Management Center . Intervention participant assign Birth Sister postpartum period . They also attend 8 weekly session weight loss program . All participant complete study assessment visit 6 week postpartum 15 week postpartum .
DOC.criteria: PreNatal : 1 . BMI great equal 25 2 . Ready change ( classified answer yes : Are seriously consider try lose weight reach goal next 6 month ? ) 3 . Englishspeaking Postpartum : 1 . Live birth ( base medical record review ) PreNatal : 1 . Signs moderate severe depression base PHQ9 2 . Previous enrollment Birth Sister 's program prior study Postpartum : 1 . Signs moderate severe postpartum depression base Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale ( EPDS )
